description: Prestige Clairemont is located in Neopolis, a newly established, futuristic, 500+ acre layout in Kokapet, which extends from the financial district.

project_description.description: Futuristic Urban Oasis: Prestige Clairemont stands proudly within Neopolis, a visionary urban expanse in Kokapet, Hyderabad. Spanning over 500 acres, Neopolis emerges as a beacon of futuristic urban development, blending innovation with functionality.

Government-Backed Innovation Hub: Crafted under the visionary leadership of the Telangana Government, Neopolis is meticulously designed to redefine urban living standards nationwide. It serves as a pioneering model for advanced infrastructure and smart city planning, embodying the essence of a progressive society.

Epicenter of Tomorrow’s Hyderabad: Neopolis serves as the nucleus of future Hyderabad, embodying the city's evolution towards modernity and sophistication. As the landscape continues to transform, Neopolis emerges as a testament to Hyderabad's journey towards becoming a global metropolis.

EUnrestricted Urban Canvas: Unlike conventional urban landscapes, Neopolis boasts a unique absence of zoning and height restrictions, fostering boundless creativity and innovation in architectural design. This liberated environment empowers developers to envision and actualize their boldest aspirations.

Integrated Community Hub: Within Neopolis, Prestige Clairemont seamlessly integrates with its surroundings, forming a harmonious blend of commercial and residential spaces. This symbiotic relationship ensures convenience and accessibility while preserving the distinct identity of each precinct.

Premium Living Redefined: Prestige Clairemont epitomizes luxury living within Neopolis, offering an unparalleled residential experience. Boasting premium amenities and exquisite craftsmanship, it sets a new standard for contemporary urban dwellings, where comfort meets sophistication.

A Vision of Progress: Neopolis emerges as a testament to human ingenuity and the relentless pursuit of progress. As it continues to evolve, it symbolizes the collective aspirations of a community striving for excellence in every facet of urban living.

nearby_projects.name: Sattva Lakeridge
nearby_projects.description: Welcome to a higher dimension of luxury at Neopolis, Hyderabad. Designed by the best minds in the industry, the 6 marvelous towers at Sattva LakeRidge complement your mindset like nothing else.

nearby_projects.name: SAS Crown
nearby_projects.description: SAS Crown luxury is a notch higher. This G+57 floors sky high structure, with 82% open to sky space, is spread across 4.5 acres of pristine green surroundings with homes in 3 different sizes.
